SELECT advertiserReviewId, advertiser, writer, rating, reviewDate, visibility, review, contractId FROM advertiser_reviews_view WHERE 1 = 1
AND advertiser LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND writer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
AND contractId LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
-- 기본 검색 없음

SELECT ct.contract_id, CONCAT(a.company_name, '(', au.user_name, ')') AS advertiser, CONCAT(c.channel_name, '(', iu.user_name, ')') AS writer FROM contract ct INNER JOIN proposal p ON ct.proposal_id = p.proposal_id INNER JOIN campaign cam ON p.campaign_id = cam.campaign_id INNER JOIN advertiser a ON cam.advertiser_id = a.advertiser_id INNER JOIN user au ON a.user_id = au.user_id INNER JOIN influencer i ON p.influencer_id = i.influencer_id INNER JOIN user iu ON i.user_id = iu.user_id LEFT JOIN channel c ON i.influencer_id = c.influencer_id WHERE ct.contract_id IN
#{id}

SELECT advertiserReviewId, advertiser, writer, rating, reviewDate, visibility, review, contractId FROM advertiser_reviews_view
AND advertiser LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchDTO.keyword}, '%')
AND writer LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchDTO.keyword}, '%')
AND contractId LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchDTO.keyword}, '%')
-- 기본 검색 없음
AND advertiserReviewId > #{cursor}
ORDER BY advertiserReviewId ASC LIMIT #{size}
